text: cleansing dip:The main event of the Mahamaham festival, which occurs once in 12 years, was observed in Kumbakonam on Monday, with lakhs of devotees taking a holy dip. It is believed that a dip in the 20 sacred wells inside the tank and in other spots in the temple town of Thanjavur district in Tamil Nadu removes one’s sins. Due to its significance and the large number of pilgrims who attend, Mahamaham is also referred to as the Kumbh Mela of the South.— PHOTO: S.R. RAGHUNATHAN
title: Huge crowds throng Kumbh Mela of south
